channel.title: Adding server to Moparscape server sTatus!
channel.description:
When i add my server to moparscape server status, this comes:
This new page is beta, servers may be added and deleted while I finish it. Thanks for being patient. Post comments about the new page here.
Welcome Urge! [size=12pt]Further Action Required, Read:[/size] New server PvPDefendX CAMMYPKING succesfully entered, however it will not show up on the list until it has been verified and approved. Your server will now be checked by logging into it with the following credentials: Username: Password: to make sure it is online, and if successful, it will be posted. You must register this username and password for me on your server and allow it to be logged into from the IP 69.39.224.55 The server will be deleted from the queue if not verified and logged into within 24 hours of posting.
I dont wanna show my username and my password, but what should i do, where should i register?? please help!

item.title: Adding server to Moparscape server sTatus!
item.dc:creator: @Urge Urge
item.description:
@Urge wrote:

But it was 100% … oh i think it was offline all the night.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding server to Moparscape server sTatus!

item.title: Adding server to Moparscape server sTatus!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

Dude. The server status page asks you to log in with “X” username and “X” password. You have to do that. AND keep your server online. If it goes below I think 37% online time it is deleted from the server status page.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding server to Moparscape server sTatus!

give a fake username and password and if they ask for emails just put your main one i dont know what to say cause i dont know what your talking about sorry

item.title: Adding server to Moparscape server sTatus!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Lol, Log in on your server with the username and password then log out and wait till the moparscape server status script runs checking servers it will log in with that to check if it is online, If it is then it will go on server status.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding server to Moparscape server sTatus!

item.title: Adding server to Moparscape server sTatus!

item.description:
@Urge wrote:

When i add my server to moparscape server status, this comes:

This new page is beta, servers may be added and deleted while I finish it. Thanks for being patient. Post comments about the new page here.

Welcome Urge!
[size=12pt]Further Action Required, Read:[/size]
New server PvPDefendX CAMMYPKING succesfully entered, however it will not show up on the list until it has been verified and approved.
Your server will now be checked by logging into it with the following credentials:
Username:
Password:
to make sure it is online, and if successful, it will be posted.
You must register this username and password for me on your server and allow it to be logged into from the IP 69.39.224.55
The server will be deleted from the queue if not verified and logged into within 24 hours of posting.

I dont wanna show my username and my password, but what should i do, where should i register??
please help!
